material.mattext: Based on the calculations you did in Excel, state the test statistic, interpret its value, and show how it was found.
Based on the dataset, the sample mean for the 71 two-seater automobiles is 20.380. We also know that μ = 20 and σ = 4.7. The test statistic is therefore:
A test statistic of 0.68 means that the sample mean is less than one standard deviation above the null value.
